title: ManchuOCR / Translation App
text:
ManchuOCR / Translation App
ManchuOCR is an end-to-end pipeline for the Manchu script: segmentation, OCR, romanization, and morphology-aware translation.

Features

Segmentation of scanned Manchu pages

Romanization and dictionary translation

Interactive morphological analysis

Modular GUI (PySide6) with custom fonts

title: Home
text:
Alexander L. G. Hutchins
Historian · Linguist · Developer

This website is currently a home for my ManchuOCR / Translation App — an ongoing project focused on digitizing and interpreting the Manchu script through OCR and linguistic analysis.
The rest of the site is under quiet development.
Future updates will include research notes and publications.
